All Implemented Interfaces:
Opponent
public class OpportunistBot extends SmartBot
The OpportunistBot class represents a bot that makes decisions to maximize its own gain.

  • Method Details

    • chooseCharacterImpl

      public Character chooseCharacterImpl (List<Character> characters)
      Chooses a character based on the player's current state and strategy. Prioritizes the Bishop if the player has at least one religious district. If the player has more than 1 gold, selects the Warlord. If any opponent has 4 or more gold, opts for the Thief. Otherwise, makes a random choice from the available characters.
      Overrides:
      chooseCharacterImpl in class SmartBot
      Parameters:
      characters - A list of characters that can be chosen from.
      Returns:
      The chosen character.

    • chooseCard

      protected Optional<Card> chooseCard()
      Chooses a religious district if available; otherwise, selects the least expensive district.
      Overrides:
      chooseCard in class SmartBot
      Returns:
      The chosen district card.
